abstract: Richmond University Medical Center agrees to pay family of Eric Garner $1 million settlement; case raised significant questions about care provided by paramedics dispatched from center.

headline.print_headline: Hospital That Treated Garner Will Pay Family $1 Million
headline.main: Staten Island Hospital That Treated Eric Garner Is to Pay Family $1 Million

keywords.value: Richmond University Medical Center (Staten Island, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Richmond University Medical Center was held responsible for failing to “provide him with the necessary lifesaving procedures,” according to documents filed in Surrogate’s Court.
lead_paragraph: Richmond University Medical Center was held responsible for failing to “provide him with the necessary lifesaving procedures,” according to documents filed in Surrogate’s Court.
